body_html: @peterjc123 , @zou3519 , I tried it on a clean Linux docker container, it works fine. But when I tried the scripts on two Windows machines, the SO exception was thrown consistently at consistent step. Please let me know if there is anything I can provide to figure out the issue.

body: @peterjc123 , @zou3519 , I tried it on a clean Linux docker container, it works fine. But when I tried the scripts on two Windows machines, the SO exception was thrown consistently at consistent step. Please let me know if there is anything I can provide to figure out the issue.
